The Menu of the day is ordered until 15:00 pm

28 lei without dessert / 41 lei with dessert

Wednesday 

Cream Chickpea Soup – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 330 ml (chickpea, carrot, celery, white onion, tomato, coconut milk, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Vegan Omelette – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 300 g (tofu, zucchini, red bell pepper, red onion, champinion mushrooms, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Whole Wheat Bread – vegan / with gluten / 70 g (whole wheat, yeast, olive oil, himalayan salt)

or gluten free option

Seeds Crackers Bread – raw / gluten free / 50 g (sun flower seeds, pumpkin seeds, flaxseed, dehydrated tomatoes, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Orange, Apricot and Carob Cake – raw / gluten free / 110 g (almonds, dates, coconut, cashews, carob powder, apricot, orange, cocoa butter, unfiltered honey)
